messages.message: @Vinay Thapa is working on this. Vinay, can you please share your findings here?

Hi Team,
I tried rephrasing the prompt slightly and added validation to ensure that both rows of the MRZ code contain 44 characters each and it was working fine for the three samples shared.
@Vinay Thapa can you share the prompt and setup so I can try with our prospect's documents?

Can you access this build app: Build App (https://aihub.instabase.com/build/a4676a76-a340-40eb-9d33-d9f4603132e9) ?
I made the changes in this app itself.
Thanks @Vinay Thapa. FYI it looks like @david.lee's deterministic fix works better for MRZ codes than the prompting approach (6/6 correct on customer samples vs 2/6 correct)

Hi team, Updated and Published the Passport app(App Link (https://aihub.instabase.com/hub/apps/5ad965e4-c521-42b2-a3c7-c44a646fdeab) ) in the marketplace with the changes to the MRZ field using the approach suggested by @david.lee.
